s: On Bob James’ first solo album One, he enlisted a string of experienced Jazz players including Steve Gadd and Idris Muhammad on drums, Grover Washington on sax and Gary King on bass. t: Amazon.com: Bob James - Two - Lp Vinyl Record: CDs & Vinyl
s: Replaced a lost/stolen vinyl copy. The price was great & it sounds good. ... This is a great Bob James album. If you're a hip hop head you'll recognize a couple of samples from your favorite old school hip hop joints. I like the whole record and Bob James is a great musician.

t: JAMES,BOB - Best of - Amazon.com Music
s: This album is fantastic. Bob James' music is sometimes really mellow, and at other times really aggressive. t: Bob James - Feel Like Making LIVE! - Amazon.com Music
s: I am still ticked at myself for paying it. I am still ticked at Bob James for allowing it. Ok, having said that... It's a friggin' live Bob James Trio record!! I had to have it! I bought only the vinyl double album, so I cannot say anything about the dvd or hi-res download or any of that.
